thread.section_title: Hotel Monge - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: d
thread.title_full: d - Review of Hotel Monge, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: hancha2017
title: d
text:
Picked this hotel because of the ratings here on TripAdvisor and was not disappointed. Rooms are very cute and clean. They are on rather small side, but provide a lot of storage space, so you don't have to trip over your luggage. Design is very pretty and provides for a charming holiday atmosphere, seems to be freshly done.A lovely boutique hotel in a great location. I had a standard double and it was charming and very clean.
I would recommend.
